channel.title: Andy Nguyen's RSS Feed
channel.description: A blog by Andy Nguyen; a web developer based out of Oklahoma 🌪️, USA.

item.title: Asking GitHub Copilot for Financial Advice (a First Look at GitHub Copilot)
item.description: First look review of GitHub Copilot; a AI tool which autosuggest whole lines or entire functions right inside the editor.

item.title: How To Deploy Gatsby to GitHub Pages With gh-pages and GitHub Actions
item.description: A tutorial showing how to deploy a Gatsby project to GitHub Pages with gh-pages and GitHub Actions. Also, this tutorial will show you how to automatically deploy a Gatsby project git repo to another git repo.

item.title: Top Software Development YouTubers
item.description: A opinionated guide to the best software development YouTube channels.

item.title: Making This Site
item.description: See the motivation and technical decisions in creating a personal website for a web developer.
